summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the update of Seattle's Comprehensive Plan; accepting a grant from and authorizing a grant agreement with the Washington State Department of Community, Trade and Economic Development to conduct outreach and to perform technical analysis related to the City's update of its Comprehensive Plan and its critical areas policies and regulations; and increasing an appropriation to the Department of Planning and Development in the 2004 Budget; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
